entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
